text: Location of Tsukubo District in Okayama Prefecture is a district located in Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the district has an estimated population of 21,601 and a population density of 789.80 persons per km². The total area is 27.35 km². ==Towns and villages== *Hayashima ==Merger== *On March 22, 2005, the villages of Yamate and Kiyone merged into the city of Sōja. Category:Districts in Okayama Prefecture
title: Tsukubo District, Okayama
